content.raw:
This error occurs when running armDemo.py with values that apparently exceed the joint limits of the arm.


```
#!text

[ERROR] [1482036248.657660099, 67.113000000]: Exception in thread "SynchronousMultiThreadedRobotController-thread-1" java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.RuntimeException: tried to cap a value 0.0 between a min of 0.0 and a max of -2.0. The max value is less than or equal to the min value
[ERROR] [1482036248.657745204, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.wholeBodyController.DRCControllerThread.run(DRCControllerThread.java:360)
[ERROR] [1482036248.657795374, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.wholeBodyController.concurrent.SynchronousMultiThreadedRobotController$ReentrantLockedControlElementRunner.run(SynchronousMultiThreadedRobotController.java:89)
[ERROR] [1482036248.657833300, 67.113000000]: 	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
[ERROR] [1482036248.657972440, 67.113000000]: Caused by: java.lang.RuntimeException: tried to cap a value 0.0 between a min of 0.0 and a max of -2.0. The max value is less than or equal to the min value
[ERROR] [1482036248.658010327, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.robotics.MathTools.clipToMinMax(MathTools.java:227)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658050103, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.robotics.math.trajectories.PolynomialTrajectoryGenerator.compute(PolynomialTrajectoryGenerator.java:50)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658095835, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.robotics.math.trajectories.CubicPolynomialTrajectoryGenerator.compute(CubicPolynomialTrajectoryGenerator.java:39)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658141372, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.robotics.math.trajectories.PolynomialTrajectoryGenerator.initialize(PolynomialTrajectoryGenerator.java:42)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658188520, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.robotics.math.trajectories.waypoints.MultipleWaypointsTrajectoryGenerator.initializeSubTrajectory(MultipleWaypointsTrajectoryGenerator.java:174)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658236999, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.robotics.math.trajectories.waypoints.MultipleWaypointsTrajectoryGenerator.compute(MultipleWaypointsTrajectoryGenerator.java:186)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658284687, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.highLevelHumanoidControl.manipulation.individual.states.JointSpaceHandControlState.doAction(JointSpaceHandControlState.java:203)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658330484, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.robotics.stateMachines.GenericStateMachine.doAction(GenericStateMachine.java:152)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658376749, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.highLevelHumanoidControl.manipulation.individual.HandControlModule.doControl(HandControlModule.java:303)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658423551, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.highLevelHumanoidControl.manipulation.ManipulationControlModule.doControl(ManipulationControlModule.java:141)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658471040, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.highLevelHumanoidControl.highLevelStates.WalkingHighLevelHumanoidController.updateManagers(WalkingHighLevelHumanoidController.java:594)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658517956, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.highLevelHumanoidControl.highLevelStates.WalkingHighLevelHumanoidController.doAction(WalkingHighLevelHumanoidController.java:521)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658561666, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.robotics.stateMachines.GenericStateMachine.doAction(GenericStateMachine.java:152)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658609520, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.commonWalkingControlModules.highLevelHumanoidControl.HighLevelHumanoidControllerManager.doControl(HighLevelHumanoidControllerManager.java:178)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658655420, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.simulationconstructionset.robotController.ModularRobotController.doControl(ModularRobotController.java:20)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658701363, 67.113000000]: 	at us.ihmc.wholeBodyController.DRCControllerThread.run(DRCControllerThread.java:352)
[ERROR] [1482036248.658748374, 67.113000000]: 	... 2 more

```

Values being attempted are:


```
#!text

d90 = 3.14/2.0

ELBOW_BENT_UP = [d90, 0.0, 0.0, d90, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0]
```
They are wrong but the error indicates something wrong in the cap routine.
